11213212.content:
"I know let's play a game" Sally says lifting you off her head and putting you down on the floor.

"Sure, what do you have in mind?" you reply.

"How about hide and seek, I really want to see just how good my mouse is at hiding" she says smiling somewhat wickedly.

"Mouse?" you reply staring up at her.

She lowers her head and whispers get "get running mousey" for some reason this spurs you into action and you bolted in the other direction into the only other room you saw, you heard Sally start counting and you took only a few seconds to scan the entirety of what you quickly figured out was a living room. It had a couch in the center, tv cabinet on one side, and a small table on the other side with the staircase. You decide the cabinet is the safest bet and you run towards it, you smile as you run under it seeing a small lip on the inside you climb up and lay in the small space it created.

"20, ready or not mousey here I come" Sally shouts. You heard Sally run into the room and start looking around you heard a vase get lifted up, the table moved around, you froze as her nose stuck under the tv cabinet and she sniffed but somehow missed you. "Hmm he's not in this room, he's smarter and faster then he looks" Sally says, you were a little annoyed by the comment but you just let it go.

You heard Sally start walking upstairs "mousey I already know you're not downstairs, it's just a matter of time till I find you" she shouts probably to get you to panic, however you weren't upstairs so the tactic didn't work. You sit back in the little alcove as you heard Sally move upstairs, she came back down after a few minutes and shouted "alright mousey your better at this then I thought, however I will find you" you heard her walk back to the kitchen probably thinking you had slipped past her when she was upstairs and went to hide there.

You layed back in the little space and somehow you fell asleep as the next thing you knew you jolted awake at the sound of something it sounded almost like whimpering. You heard something very large fall to the floor and Sally's voice, "why, I finally found you again, why did you leave me?" and then you heard her start to sob. You jumped down from your little spot and ran out from under the gigantic tv cabinet to find Sally on hands and knees. "Sally?" you say really unsure if she was okay, her ears perked up at the sound of your voice and she turned her head her eyes locking right onto you.

She leaped at you sliding over the floor for a bit her hands closing around you, you were lifted up and she happily licked you and rubbed you against her cheek "you didn't abandon me" she says joy evident in her voice. "I am never letting you out of my sight again" she says holding you at arms length she suprises you as she leans forward and kisses you for a second "I love you my little mouse" she says starting to purr she hugs you to her cheek again.

"Sally, your ok right?" you ask startled by the actions of the last few seconds.

"Oh, of course, it's just, I thought my ultimate nightmare was coming true, I, I thought you'd hate the new me and abandon me" she says holding you out and looking down at you.

"What? I would never do that, your still my wonderful and cat and I love you" you say.

"I love you too" she replies and then flares red ".....you know as a pet" she says.

"Oh no you don't you really do love me don't you?" you ask.

"Well, you took care of me, always made sure i had food and shelter and you, you loved me and accepted me even as a stray when no one else would, so of course I love you" she says. You motion for Sally to move forward and she does and you kiss her nose "that's my lovely kitten" you say. Sally smiles the biggest smile you've ever seen and she moves forward and grabs your shirt between her teeth. She then lowers herself to all 4s and bounds up the stairs you swinging from under her mouth your shirt the only thing keeping you from being sent hurtling. She leaps onto the bed and carefully deposits you onto the gigantic bed, before you can do anything her tail wrapped around you along with the rest of her body and she starts purring up a storm. You look up at your giant cat and she smiles down at you "my cute little mousey" she says lowering her head and gently licking you.

"Can you please stop with the mouse nickname, no offense but it kind of makes me feel like I'm prey" you say.

"Don't worry, I would never hurt my little mousey" she says smiling at you "maybe play around a bit but I'd never hurt you" she says. You stare up at the cat and she lifts you up and turns onto her stomach "do you honestly think I'd hurt you, I mean you did so much for me, plus I have had you unconcious for a while" she says putting you down on her stomach. She pulls herself back across the bed till she's resting against the headboard of the bed "is there anything I can do to prove I wouldn't hurt you" she says.

"I can think of a few things, but I'd really rather not do any of them" you say "besides if you wanted me hurt you would have, so I'll just trust you" you say. Sally started to gently purr again "thank you so much" she says lifting you up and cuddling you "how did I ever get so lucky to meet you" she says.

"The same way I was lucky to meet you my beautiful kitten" you say hugging her cheek. Sally lays back and lays you out on her back, then she starts to gently pet you with 1 finger "you know I always loved your petting, it always told me that you were paying attention to me and me alone, on top of it feeling soooo good" she says giggling. You could only nod in reply as she was being so gentle you couldn't believe this was coming from something so big. You froze as you felt Sally's claw pull on your shirt, "come on now mousey let's get you out of those clothes" she quietly says.

You slowly move so her claw is out of your clothes and sit up "I'm quite happy clothed for right now" you reply.

"Aww is someone embarrassed? Don't worry little mouse I won't laugh" she says. You look up at the giant cat who smiles and says in a whisper that felt more like a command then a whisper "little mousey take them off" Sally putting emphasis on each word. You stared up at her for a few seconds and she smiled that wicked grin only cats can. You felt one claw weazle it's way under your shirt and pull back out again. You slowly undress as Sally would probably declothe you forecfully if you didn't and then freeze as you felt her finger start to gently stroke your back again and you were gently pushed into Sally's stomach. You couldn't help but relax even going so far as to lay out so she had easy access to you "that's it little mousey, kitty won't hurt you" Sally whispers.

You just nodded in reply and Sally gently pushed you up her body one finger still petting you, she stopped you in between her small hills. You look up at your giant cat who smiles down at you "as long as you take care of me mousey I'll always take care of you, now go to sleep" she whispers. The effect of her whole little speech was however ruined as she had to lift you up for a few seconds to get under the covers herself but she gently put you back down between her hills "good night my little mouse" she says going back to stroking you.

"Good night my big and beautiful kitten" you reply giving off a small sigh before the combination of Sally's heartbeat and the gentle petting lulled you to sleep.

1121322221.content:
It was Kieth's favorite day; friday. A day to b happy about when work was over, and, being it his first day of vacation, Kieth felt like taking the scenic route home today.

His location was the best he could wish for; mountainous roads and houses separated by large increments of trees, some even miles away. His job was a steady one which he enjoyed. Being the manager of a small wing of a corporate business had it's upsides and downsides. Though due to his experience in his field, and his dillagence and hard working attitude, he was able to afford a nice sized house, a steady income and a backyard full of mountain and trees. All at the age of 23.

His stroll through the less walked path was a pleasent one, full of autumn air and auburn tree leaves falling steadily over head. Being bundled up in a soft, warm coat was one of his guilty pleasures, and the nippy air that brushed over his body helped him gain an excuse to do so. As he watched the wind blow steadily he began to notice some strange sounds; first a couple of thumps followed by rustling then many footsteps and a few men shouting.

He shrugged this off for hunting season....but the more he thought of it, the more he realized that thumping couldn't have been human. "Wooo-AAUH!" Kieth fell into what he thought was a small pot hole, but on further inspection, noticed it was a huge paw print, three digits jutting out of a large base. He quickly stood up and walked away with vigor.

His curiosity got the best of him though as he walked straight back to the prints and would follow it to the source. For a good 20 yards he tracked the large imprints path, coming upon a complete stop. He looked left and right, just staring at piles of trees and a big bush. He looked all around the ground searching for more clues as to the owner of these prints when he came across the faint imprint of a foot. He carefully looked closer and saw lead to somewhere near, crawling on all hands to gain suspense.

"OOF" His head bumped into a pile of bush and he looked up to see nothing but foliage. He grunted and turned away annoyed that nothing was ther- *SNATCH*

In an instant he was plunged into darkness, a long red...something had snatched him into the bushes and he was struggling for life, trying to break free of the long objects grasp, cries muffled by it. All his struggling stopped as a hot breath blew over his head. "I don't want you to scream, struggle or try to escape. Do waht i say and you'll live." A deep yet youthfull voice was wispering to him. "Now, will you co-operate?" He nodded his head rapidly to gesture yes. "Good. Now, i'm being followed by some... people that i'd rather not have them following me. What i need you to do,is tell them i kept heading upwards, towards the mountain top straight across my tracks. Make sure you seem convincing enough or they won't buy it." He released him as soon as he heard footsteps.

"You there! Sir!" A group of men wearing uniforms came scrambling up to Kieth the leader of the group, in lab coat uniform and panting heavily. "Sir, have you seen anything strange or noises not akin to this area?" Kieths heart pounded. He could lie and maybe get away or end up dead, or tell the truth and be at the mercy of the monster. He nodded his head.

"Y-yeah.. i saw a big red blur head that way!" Kieth pointed towards the direction the prints were going and made sure of it by glancing back a bit "I-i couldn't tell what it was but it was fast! You might wanna hurry, or you'll lose it!" The man grimaced and gestured for the men to follow running straight upwards. Kieth froze there for a good five minutes before he jumped at a voice coming from behind.

"Phew.. thought i'd never lose them." The bushes rustled and light footsteps were heard Kieth had enough time to turn around and see-
1121322221.title: Forced Help

11213222212.content:
A large red tail smacked straight into his head, knocking him out and into unconciousness.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------

Kieths head ached, his body ached and worst of all he had just woke up. Kieth halted before moving a limb as he noticed several thing; first, he was on a steady up and down motion, second he was in an arching postion over something that would shift back and forth, thirdly... he heard breathing. Kieth had his senses in order and was about to jump, opening his eyes and only twitched before he heard the beast talk to him.

"Do you really wanna do that? It's a good fall there from me to the ground." He stopped in his path waiting for his victim to act. Kieth slouched back into his position as if to make the beast think it was futile but as soon as the giant started walking again, he lept as fast as he could and-

Was caught. One tight hand grabbed him and was met by another, slowly pulling him to the front. "I told you not to jump!" His body underwent a small fit of vertigo as he was swung in front of the beast, there in front of him he stared and gasped. Before him was the face of a very malicious looking monster, reptilian in style. His face jutted out only shortly in a small manor of a snout and two horns grew from the top of his head. A small black triangle traveled down his snout and was preceeded by two smaller triangles, two black lines traveled up from his lips to his snout and faded to his red hue. His crimson color was mottled by strange symbols and a very white underbelly. But his most notable features were his big yellow eyes and his grey, spiked hair.

Kieth thought of one thing to do; scream for help. "HEEEELP!" The monster glared at the human. "Help! Someone please help, there's a monster, he's kidnapped me! HELP! HELP!"

"HEY!" The monster shook the human a bit. "Keep it down will yah!" He snarled at the fragile human to get his point across, this only made Kieth struggle and wince, causing him to squirm uncontrallably.

"HELP! POLICE! SOMONE!" He continued struggling.

"Stop it!" He squeezed on the human but he didn't stop squirming and shouting. "Don't make me..." The human wouldn't listen. "GRRRR, Okay you asked for this!" THe monster brought the human to his mouth slowly opwning and beginning to insert the human into his mouth.

Kieth froze, he watched as the teeth of the beast swept over his vision and his front was filled with the gaping maw of the monster, he stuttered and before being completely consumed by the mouth he shouted: "WAIT! NO! Stop" The hand paused "I'll cooperate, i'll cooperate. Just don't eat me please. I won't say a word!" He pleaded in a defeated tone.

Several seconds passed before he was relieved of his stress and was brought back into the fresh air. "Do you rally promise?" The monster gave him a stern look. Kieth nodded without hesitation, "Then will you shut up so i don't have to eat you? I don't want to get caught, but if we do, either way, you'll be my snack if anything goes wrong!" Kieth sniffled as he nodded and let his head hang low. "Good, now, just be glad you riding on my shoulder instead of my gut!" He was forcefully placed back into his former position, now facing the same direction as the monster.

"The name's Growlmon....by the way..." Growlmon started to walk right on as if nothing had just happened.
11213222212.title: *THWACK* Out cold

112132222122.content:
Keith could only grasp onto the smooth scaled, and almost fleshy surface of the monster keeping him hostage... or Growlmon as it called itself. He didn't want to anger the beast anymore than he already had and just lied on the monsters shoulder hunched in an uncomfortable position. If he wanted to look forward he'd have to crane his body upward and that caused stress against the shoulder that made him feel unpleasent, not to mention tiresome. So instead he would conform his body to the monsters body and just stared straight down to the ground, watching it pass by, each step of the giant taking him further into the mountains and further away from home.

Of course looking down at the ground was usually inturrupted by the monsters body, occassionally getting in the way of his vision. This gave him a slight view of his body. This beast was strong and muscular, with formed pecks and bold arms, nothing bulged though, with muscles as great as his you believed he could rip a tree down just with one arm. Scanning lower on his body, you noticed that his hips were just a teeny bit wider than what male would normally posses in proportion. Then there were those legs and feat, both collosal to Keith, not to mention very dangerous. A quick trip underneath those padded crushers and would be lights out.

But what Kieth really couldn't stop glancing at was his huge endoument. An ample set of pure white colored orbs hung below the that pole of meat that made Kieth concsious of his own size. The shaft was a simple, long piece of flesh that began with white base and ended with an almost beige color. It was intimidating the least to say, and massive compared to your state and size. Whenever you'd get a clear glance at his set you would blush and try to look away, embaressed of the thoughts that crept into your mind... just thinking about being underneath the soft, heavy sets of twin balls, maybe even lying underneath his soft fleshy mounds of cheeks while he slowly began to sit on--

A pair of massive claws grabs Kieth from the shoulder and he tenses immediatley, hoping he isn't going to use him as a snack. The beast bends down and slowly places Kieth on the ground with hands still wrapped around him. This was an incentive probably to let him know not to run away. Sighing as he's finally released from the grip he turns around to the stern looking face of the lizard; Growlmon. "Now, it's getting late and i've been walking most of the day with you as cargo," His voice was deep yet commanding and calm. "so we're setting up camp here. I want you to stay in ths spot while i go hunting for food, you can probably tell from my gurgling gut that im famished." 11231211.content:
"Oh man what a day I'm beat" you say shutting the door to your house and dropping your attache case on the floor. You kick off your shoes, hang your coat up and walk upstairs to change into something less stuffy then a business suit. After changing into a pair of black shorts and a white t-shirt as it was summer. You walked downstairs, grabbed a popsicle, sat down in your personal recliner with a fan, shut the lights off and just sat there watching tv. "It feels so good to unwind" you think to yourself as you sat in the dark nothing on your mind other then the flickering images of the television, the soft breeze the fan was blowing upon you, and the cool treat you were licking.

For some reason you decided to look over at the wall length window you had in the living room, the sight you saw froze your heart. All you could see in the darkness were 2 green orbs as well as some golden things to the sides and underneath the orbs that reflected the light of the tv. These orbs were easily as big as your torso and as soon as you saw them they as well as the gold disappeared, you shook your head and looked back to see only darkness.

Being the curious person you are however you decide to go investigate, you search around and finally find a flashlight in a drawer, you walk to door and flick the light on cautiously stepping outside. The beam travels over a bunch of things before hitting something strange, it looked black even with the beam right on it, you tilted the beam sideways and you nearly blinded yourself as the beam reflected full force on you. You stumbled backwards tripping over a tree root and dropping the flashlight, you just lay there for a second until something totally eclipsed the light of the flashlight and something surrounded you.

2 things came together one lifting you up the other covering your entire front, it was strange as the things felt well furry. You were held up to a third surface that was also furry and you felt movement, like something breathing, "what the hell is going on?" you think. You tried to scream but the thing almost seemed to know you were going to scream as the top part pushed down on you sending the message "shut up or else."

Whatever this thing was it started to move, you just lay there between what you realized were hands but they were covered in fur. This creature just kept running you heard a tree fall every so often, how big is this thing?" you think to yourself. You saw streams of light and knowing it was a little past midnight you knew that this creature had entered some sort of lit, place. All too suddenly you were dropped on what you quickly realized was a throne and the creature stepped back and smiled down at you.

You looked up to see what you were dealing with, first you realized this creature was massive in size standing probably 80ft tall as the throne was on a raised area with stairs leading up to it probably to let some sort of king rule over their subjects from well, on high. Next you realized that it was a she, and she was some kind of jackal like Anubis. She had very large pointed ears sticking out of the top of her head and long black hair that cascaded down her back. Pure green eyes stared down at you curious as to what you were doing and her face led down into a muzzle with a quite cute small black nose at the end. She wore 2 gold bands which held parts of her hair together in circles and a 3rd ornate circle of gold almost like a very expensive collar surrounded her neck. Her body was covered in fur as black as a moonless night as well as a white dress reminiscent of Cleopatra that flowed down to the floor. Even with the dress you could tell she had a wonderful figure, her arms and legs were long and thin. She had a very noticeable hourglass figure and her chest was quite big probably DD as 2 quite noticeable orbs could be seen through the dress. From what you could see a small dog-like tail also extended from the back of the dress.

"Pharaoh, are you alright?" the girl asks. Her speech not only knocked you out of your reverie but made you jump a foot in the air. You looked up at the jackal girl as even though you were on a raised throne you were still only neck height on her and timidly replied "y...you can talk?"

"Of course I can my pharoah, how could I serve you if I could not speak?" she asks.

"Serve me?" you ask honestly confused.

"Yes, I have traced your ancestry back to the great pharaohs of Egypt and becuase of that my pharaoh I must ask a great favor of you" she says. She stops for a second and deciding on something she lowers herself to the floor in a bowing position. "Please oh pharaoh, I am Anette daughter of Anubis, please accept me as your servant" she says.

"Uh....why?" you ask really too overwhelmed to do much more then go along with what was happening.

"My pharaoh, as you can see I am a jackal, we are meant to serve the great pharaohs, however as I young when Egypt rained by the time I grew up the pharaohs started to die out, I am suprised I even found one remaining" she says smiling slightly now.

"Why do you have to serve?" you ask Anette.

"My Pharaoh, a Jackal servant passes onto the afterlife with their Pharaoh, to serve them in bliss for all eternity, I have lived many centuries and have not served a single pharaoh, I can feel my life coming to an end, I know this is not Egypt but please oh Pharaoh allow me the honor of serving you so that I may serve you and see my family in the afterlife" she says.

"Wait....so if you don't serve a pharaoh you won't see your family again?" you ask the gigantic jackal, all fear of her disappearing. She nods and you look at her still bowed form. "All right then, Anette my one and only servant you may stand" you say having to hold back a smile as you really weren't someone who had power often.

She slowly stands up trying to act like a slave she tries to hold back her emotions but you can just see her tail wagging from side to side. She drops down on one knee "thank you oh Pharaoh, I promise that I will do my best to serve you and to provide your every need and want" she says.

You couldn't help but smile "that is wonderful Anette thank you, although we have just met how can you be so loyal?" you ask. Anette stares at you and smiles "I was raised as a servant my Pharaoh so I must be able to trust easily" she replies. She looks down at you and smiles "my Pharaoh may i know your name?" she asks.

"Alex" you reply staring at the jackal.

"Thank you my Pharaoh, now I know what to enscribe in your pyramid" she says.

"Uh...thanks, you do know most people now a days live a lot longer then back in the times of Ancient Egypt right?" you ask.

"Yes I do my Pharaoh, in fact it's part of what I am counting on, so that you will live your life to the fullest and then you will pass and I will pass soon after" she says.

"That sounds alright Anette" you reply. She starts to fidget "is there something wrong?" you ask.

"Yes my Pharaoh, you have not commanded me, are you satisfied right now?" she asks.

11231212221.content:
You run through the savanna as fast as possible, sweating heavily in the African sun. You glance over your shoulder at the two lions running after you, their fangs bared as they roar at you.

This safari did not go as planned.

First your truck runs out of gas a few miles away from the camp, then you get attacked by lions. Not a good day for you. You finally reach a tree that looks climbable, and clamber up it, managing to evade the big cats for a little bit. They reach the tree and swipe at you, but they aren't able to climb up the tree. The problem now is that you're stuck here, and you don't see any way to get down.

But then, you see a large shape moving between the trees of the savanna. It's staying low, and the tall grass around here obscures it further, but you can tell that it's very big and colored gold and brown. The two lions stop swiping at you, and turn towards the shape, having sensed its presence through scent or hearing. They back away from the shape as it rises from the grass, and you stare in awe at a creature you've never seen before.

It resembles a hyena, but two major things stand out about it: first, it has the body shape of a young human woman, complete with a pair of fur-covered (and rather small, you note) breasts on its chest; and second, it (or more likely, "she", considering her chest) is several stories tall, standing above even the trees of the savanna. As she stands there, you get a good look at her, taking in her golden fur with dark brown spots on her sides, arms, and apparently the back too; the short fluffy tail waving behind her; and two big ears standing up tall on her head, which seems like an odd mix of humanoid and canine. The creature also has digitigrade feet, and hands with three fingers and a thumb. All of her digits have short, sharp claws.

The giant anthropomorphic hyena looms over the trees as she stares at the two lions with her dark eyes, baring her maw full of fangs. The two lions, understandably, run away from this new threat. Unfortunately, you cannot do the same. The anthro hyena takes her gaze off the lions and turns to you, making you sweat even more in fear. You're high up in the tree, and it would be too difficult to safely make your way down and run; and even if you did, the giant beast would be upon you in no time. So, all you can do is watch as the bizarre and gigantic cross between hyena and girl walks towards you. At your place in the tree, you're just about chest height with the giant creature, and so she crouches to bring her face up close to you upon reaching you. You shudder as you realize that her face is as big as your whole body.

She sniffs at you a little bit, cocking her head to the side. You stay still, not wanting to agitate this creature. It seems like that was a good idea, as she does not attack you.

However, she does do something else. Reaching forward with her left hand-like paw, the fingers splayed, you realize she's about to grab you. You remain still nonetheless, and allow her hand to reach you. The fingers curl around your torso, thankfully not pinning your arms, since they were already raised to hang on to branches. The giant creature's grip tightens around you, your body squeezed between the surprisingly soft pawpads on her palm and fingers, and you let go of the branches you were holding, because there's no sense in trying to resist as she pulls you from between the tree's branches and out into the open air.

Rising to her full height, she brings you up to her face and studies you with interest. Though her grasp is firm and slightly painful, you refuse to squirm. It would be useless, after all. You just stay still as this strange feminine beast holds you dozens of feet above the ground and looks you over.

After studying you for a while...

-Max Richardson: 19, 6'4, heavier set guy, darker skin. Kind of shy in.spite of his size.

-Jenna Jameson: 19, 5'5, ginger, outwardly friendly, but incredibly condescending and passive aggressive

-Jason Lee: 21, 5'10, Asian, Jenna's boyfriend, alpha male mentality

-Valaria Alverez: 21, 4'11 Hispanic, very extroverted

-Chad Rogers: 19, 6'0, sandy-blonde hair, surfer body, has a crush on Allie

-Michelle Johnson: 20, 5'2, black, distant, shy

122331.title: Story Pitch- The Island

1223312.content:
Jurassic Park but with monster people replacing dinosaurs

The T-Rexes= 50 foot tall men/women, aggressive

The Bracheosaurouses= 100 foot tall men/women, aggressive

The Tricerotops and Stegosaurous= large centaurs

The Dilophosaurous/Raptors= vampires

Flying dinosaurs= fairies of various sizes

Compies= 8 inch tall vampires

Random mid-sized dinosaurs= Amazonians

Sea dinos= mermaids/mermen of various sizes


The park is opening for the first time and you, along with the rest of your year 12 class, have been given the chance to take the tour before anyone else. But after a power outage, all of the monsters get loose and run amok throughout the park.

Do you want to visit Monster Park or do you want a different scenario?
1223312.title: Another Story- Monster Park

choices: Abducted and Turned into a Giant
12233122.content:
How about a story where instead of you being abducted by an actual giant, why not an actual story where you do get abducted and then you are turned into a bloodthirsty giant?

The story would go out like this, you were just one day minding your business through town when suddenly a minivan comes up driving by you, you try to walk away, but then suddenly some people come out and subdue you and take you into the van and drive away. Next thing you know, you are in a testing facility where you are revealed to been transformed into a giant, and whatever happened from there comes up to the reader.

Want to use the Abducted then Turned into a Giant story?
12233122.title: Abduction Twist

Something giant has caught you, now what?

info.description:
Okay, not going to tie up anyone with terribly many rules. Just a few words of warning before you go in.

1. There can be sex, but don't go terribly into detail. Additionally, sex with minors is strictly forbidden. Do not test me on that.

2. Please make the entries worth their chapter page. Try to make it at LEAST one paragraph. I will allow things such as a "So are you a boy or a girl?" as a chapter when appropriate.

3. I will probably remove chapters written that violate guideline number one.

4.Try to avoid killing the main character.

5. And please, keep the focus on the main character and the captor. Try not to add additional main characters.

With that out of the way, please, feel free to add as you see fit, and most importantly, have fun.
